Class Noticeboard

java.lang.Object
model.Noticeboard
public class Noticeboard extends Object

A Noticeboard in the model.

Every Noticeboard has a collection of displayed ToDo.

The class provides methods to retrieve, add and remove the displayed ToDos.

      public Noticeboard(int boardID, String title, String description, int userID)

      Instantiates a new Noticeboard with no todos.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the id
      title - the title
      description - the description
      userID - the owner user's ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if title is null or blank

    • addToDo

      public void addToDo(ToDo todo)

      Adds ToDo to the Noticeboard.

      Parameters:
      todo - the ToDo
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if todo is null
      NoSuchElementException - if the Noticeboard does not exist
      IllegalStateException - if a ToDo with the same title already exists in the Noticeboard

    • deleteToDo

      public void deleteToDo(String title)

      Deletes a ToDo from the Noticeboard.

      Parameters:
      title - the title
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the ToDo does not exist
